main.name: Olumide Okubanjo
main.description: I am a Software Developer currently studying computer science at the University of Alberta. I am looking for more experience developing and maintaining a variety of applications to grow in my professional field
main.bio: I am a Software Developer, currently living in Edmonton, Alberta. I am studying Computer Science at the University of Alberta and my primary focus in my studies is Software Development. I also love to work on projects in Data Analysis, Computer Networking, and Machine learning. In my free time, I like studying human computer interaction. I am driven and self-motivated and am constantly experimenting with new technologies and algorithms. I am very passionate about Java, Python, C/C++, React, React Native, and Fullstack Web development.
main.contactmessage: If you wish to get in contact with me please fill out the form below and I will get back to you shortly. My email is also there if you would prefer that method.
